title: No Duplicate Head
content:
# No Duplicate Head

> Prevent duplicate usage of `<Head>` in `pages/_document.js`.

title: No Duplicate Head
content:
## [Why This Error Occurred](#why-this-error-occurred)

More than a single instance of the `<Head />` component was used in a single custom document. This can cause unexpected behavior in your application.
preview: More than a single instance of the `<Head />` component was used in a single custom document. This can cause unexpected behavior in your application.

title: No Duplicate Head
preview: Only use a single `<Head />` component in your custom document in `pages/_document.js`. pages/\_document.js [Code Block]

title: No Duplicate Head
